name: Seuljok Jump
description:
Meet Seuljok the toad who likes to jump, his goal is to jump as long as he can before he falls down back to Mystical Forest!

                                             

Important Note:  There might be a few game breaking bugs with generation sometimes, we are aware, and sorry for that! 

Our first game on Unity!

Credits:  

  • Art and UI: FluffyRia
  • Programming, Soundtrack and SFX: JackGhoster
